overview:
Brett Goldberg is an entrepreneur, intrapreneur and business professional who has been helping grow the Internet and digital media landscape for the past 12 years.

Brett launched Cdigix in late 2000, a leader throughout the decade in the digital media space for the college marketplace. He wore many hats at Cdigix including head of marketing, sales, business development, programming and President, The Company was originally based in Denver and then moved to Seattle in 2005.

Brett joined Level (3) Communications in late 2007 as a Director of Product Management in the Content Markets Group (CMG.) The CMG unit focused on building value-add services on top of the expansive Level (3) fiber optic network primarily for the media/entertainment sector. I focused on the construction and roll-out of CDN products and application services for the group.

Most recently, he’s been with ServiceSource International (NASDAQ: SREV,) a rapidly growing, San Fran based organization that pioneered the Service Performance Management industry for tech and healthcare businesses. Brett has helped run the Denver branch of the Company since mid 2010 and manages a portfolio of client engagements in his role.
